channel.title: SoftLayer_Container_Product_Order_Network_Message_Delivery on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in SoftLayer_Container_Product_Order_Network_Message_Delivery on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Product_Order_Network_Message_Delivery
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Product_Order_Network_Message_Delivery Datatype Description This is the datatype that needs to be populated and sent to SoftLayer_Product_Order::placeOrder. This datatype has everything required to place a network message delivery order with SoftLayer. Local accountPassword The account password for SendGrid enrollment. Type: string accountUsername The username for SendGrid enrollment. Type: string bigDataOrderFlag Flag for identifying an order for Big Data Deployment. Type: boolean
